attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
John Prescott deserves to be deported to Uzbekistan for many reasons.

1) Having fun with his secretary Tracy Temple while undertaking public service.

2) Having 3 Jags and god knows how many houses.

3) Being an overweight waste of space.

4) Hitting protesters, clearly revealing how much he hates Democracy.

5) Being a Europhile.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
